name: LD#50 Sacrificium (Sacrifice)
description:
Ludum Dare #50 : Delay the Inevitable. 

They say the key to eternal life is bathing in the blood of virgins. If that is true or not remains to be seen, they only just started saying it. But you don’t want to find out. You’re the virgin.

SERPENS EST DEUS. MAGNUS ANGUIS DEUS.

Explore the lair of the Cult of the Snake God to finds your means of escape. Over 250 possible paths to salvation and not quite eternal, but longer than if you stay here, life! Use WASD to move, and E to interact with the environment to find the tools to help you get the other tools to help you not be the sacrifice.

Credits:
